Style map containing styles for different states of this UIElement

public StyleMap StyleMap

StyleMap

SupportedBrushes

Dictionary of supported brushes for each style type (used for validation)

public Dictionary<StyleMap.ControlStyleType, IBrush.BrushType[]> SupportedBrushes

Field Value

Dictionary<StyleMap.ControlStyleType, IBrush.BrushType[]>

_UseFallbackForUnsupportedBrushes

If true, unsupported brushes will use their fallback color instead of throwing an exception

protected bool _UseFallbackForUnsupportedBrushes

Field Value

bool
